subdefinitions.definition: A formal legal decree , opinion , or ruling issued by a mufti or other Islamic judicial authority .
examples: The website contains fatwas on points of Islamic law that arise in court cases.

subdefinitions.definition: A decree issued by a mufti or other Islamic judicial authority that a person should be put to death , usually as punishment for committing apostasy or blasphemy .

definitions.definition: A formal decree or ruling, or statement , issued by an authority of a religion other than Islam .
An emphatic decree or opinion, especially one which condemns or criticizes .

secondary_definitions: ( religion , by extension ) A formal decree or ruling, or statement , issued by an authority of a religion other than Islam .
( figurative , informal ) An emphatic decree or opinion, especially one which condemns or criticizes .
